channel.title: Factions and Figures
channel.description: Recent content on Factions and Figures

item.title: rattle for machine learning
item.description: So we are getting to work on a virtual machine just to use some fast specs, 32 core CPU and 52Gb RAM… Should be fun…

item.title: Melbourne Data Science Week 2017
item.description: Nathan, Aidan and I can now blog from R so we will put up some of the other content we went through here just for fun. Then afterwards we can use it for Factions and Figures… For example, some cool packages: library(plotly) library(sf) And there were stickers…

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
